title: Starter Pack
description: 5 essential protein pancake recipes to get you started. Perfect for beginners!

title: Weekend Brunch
description: A collection of our most indulgent and impressive breakfast recipes, perfect for a leisurely weekend brunch.

title: Quick & Easy
description: Short on time? These simple and speedy recipes will have you enjoying a high-protein breakfast in 15 minutes or less.

title: Savory Breakfast
description: Not a fan of sweet breakfasts? This pack is for you! Enjoy a variety of savory pancakes and crepes.

title: Waffle Lovers
description: A collection of our best and most creative protein waffle recipes, from classic to decadent.

title: Crepe Collection
description: Explore the delicate and delicious world of high-protein crepes with this collection of sweet and savory recipes.

title: High-Protein Stack
description: Maximize your protein intake with this collection of our highest-protein pancake and waffle recipes.

title: Gluten-Free & Dairy-Free
description: A collection of our best gluten-free and dairy-free recipes, perfect for those with dietary restrictions.
